What roles did Will Turner play in relation to Sparrow in 'Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl'?
Options:
A. He released Sparrow to rescue Elizabeth.
B. He was a prison guard who released Sparrow.

Correct Answer: He released Sparrow to rescue Elizabeth., He was a prison guard who released Sparrow.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the Spruce Goose stage and the Black Pearl ship?
Options:
A. a) The Black Pearl was built on the Spruce Goose stage.
B. b) The Spruce Goose stage was used to control fog and lighting for the Black Pearl.
C. c) The Curse of the Black Pearl refers to the ship's name.
D. d) The Black Pearl was used to film scenes involving pirates.
Correct Answer: a) The Black Pearl was built on the Spruce Goose stage. & b) The Spruce Goose stage was used to control fog and lighting for the Black Pearl.

Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of the Black Pearl in *Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl*?
Options:
A. a) The Black Pearl was built on the Spruce Goose stage.
B. b) The Black Pearl utilized computer-generated imagery for its finishing structures.
C. c) The Black Pearl was constructed primarily using traditional shipbuilding techniques.
D. d) The Spruce Goose stage was used to control fog and lighting for the Black Pearl.
Correct Answer: a) The Black Pearl was built on the Spruce Goose stage. b) The Black Pearl utilized computer-generated imagery for its finishing structures. d) The Spruce Goose stage was used to control fog and lighting for the Black Pearl.

Which of the following statements are true regarding the ships used in *Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl*?
Options:
A. a) The Dauntless was built on a barge.
B. b) The Black Pearl utilized computer-generated imagery for its finishing touches.
C. c) Both the Black Pearl and Dauntless were built on barges.
D. d) The Interceptor was also built using computer-generated imagery.
Correct Answer: b) The Black Pearl utilized computer-generated imagery for its finishing touches. and c) Both the Black Pearl and Dauntless were built on barges.
